_header: Now tho me thou take good heed
Subjects: medicine; urines; introductions to prose texts
_description: Four lines introducing a prose tract on Urines

BodAsh1438.Transcription:
Now tho me þu take goode hedehow þou myȝte þy
                    body fedelyke vnto þy sustynawnseto kepe þy fleche in
                    governawnce
BodAsh1438.Editions:
Black,  William Henry. 
             Catalogi Codicum Manuscriptorum Bibliothecae Bodleianae…Pars X,
                A…Catalogue of the Manuscripts bequeathed…by Elias Ashmole.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1845: 1185.
